Introduction

PinkFantasy SHY (Korean: 핑크판타지 샤이) was the first sub-unit of the girl group PinkFantasy. They debuted with members SeeA, Yubeen and Harin on March 26, 2019 with the digital single "12 O'Clock". On June 28, 2020, MyDoll released a statement saying Yubeen had departed from the group due to health issues and was later replaced by Arang in their website profile pictures.
